mapper.sql: ReturnVisitId, userId, username, address, lastVistTime, countVisit
mapper.insert:
insert into returnvisit
ReturnVisitId,
userId,
username,
address,
lastVistTime,
countVisit,

#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update returnvisit
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastVistTime = #{lastvisttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
countVisit = #{countvisit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ReturnVisitId = #{returnvisitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update returnvisit set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastVistTime = #{lastvisttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, countVisit = #{countvisit,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ReturnVisitId = #{returnvisitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select r.*,u.userName from returnvisit r,user u,branch b,employee e where r.userId = u.userId and u.areaId = b.areaId and b.employeeId = e.employeeId and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
